Data: 13.50 We are ten minutes away from the toss. Moody expects it to be a bat-first track. His co-commentator Roshan Abeyasinghe agrees with him, citing some cracks in the pitch. It's very windy in Hambantota.
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run gets a hint of outswing first up, Tharanga pushes this to mid-on. Fullish delivery
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run this one doesn't swing in, but Tharanga plays for it, and ends up pushing inside the line of the ball
Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 wide tries the bouncer, but it is too short and too high
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run back of a length, just outside off, Tharanga pushes it to cover
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run again, plays for the non-existent swing, turning his wrists on this one, gets a leading edge towards point
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run this one swings ina bit, gets the inside edge onto the pad. A stifled appeal ensues
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run defended with an open face, towards point. Just the one wide off the over
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run goes after the first delivery, it's wide, way too wide for him to go at it without moving his feet
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run extra bounce for Bollinger as Dilshan slashes at this, looking to go over point. Is beaten by the bounce
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run fuller, swings in a bit, Dilshan pushes it back to Bollinger. That he had to hurriedly get the front pad out of the way suggests he was not expecting swing
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run shorter, wider, left alone
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run and he beats the edge with a short-of-a-length delivery just outside off. Dilshan played a defensive shot inside the line
Bollinger to Dilshan, 1 run a good delivery but how well has he played this? Full and swinging in, towards off and middle, he makes room and plays with an open face, guiding it to third man for one
Lee to Dilshan, FOUR runs top shot, meets this back-of-a-length delivery with a full face, timing it well, between the bowler and mid-on
Lee to Dilshan, FOUR runs if the last ball was persuaded, this has been forced for four. Makes room and crashes this through covers. Beats the short extra cover

Lee to Dilshan, 2 runs smart work from Watson, not so smart from Lee. Dilshan has hit this powerfully, straight to Watson at short extra cover, who throws down the non-striker's stump direct. Tharanga is back in, but Lee just has a nothing flick back at Dilshan, who gets out of
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run placed wide of mid-on for one
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run pushed to cover
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run driven firmly, finds mid-off
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run short of a good length on middle, rocks back and defends it into the leg side
Bollinger to Dilshan, FOUR runs smashed, on the up, lands on a good length and he flays it imperiously past extra cover
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run around a good length just outside off, pushed on the bounce to that short extra cover fielder
Bollinger to Dilshan, 1 run straying on the pads, tickles it down towards fine leg for a single

Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run slightly short, going down leg, was caught in two minds about playing at that one, looking to turn it into the leg side at first but then opted against it, struck on the pads
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs nicely timed, picked the gap very well, punched firmly off the front foot, on the up, past extra cover for a boundary
Watson to Dilshan, no run goes for the big cut immediately, this one stays low, and squeezes under the bat
Watson to Dilshan, FOUR runs Crack. Gentle short delivery, wide enough, and Dilshan gives it the treatment square on off side
Watson to Dilshan, no run full, into the pads, driven down the ground, finds mid-on
Watson to Dilshan, no run stops at him, Dilshan plays this uppishly through short extra cover from where Hussey was just moved to his left to prevent the boundaries that Dilshan has been hitting
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run steered to third man for a single
Watson to Upul Tharanga, 1 run pushed wide of mid-on for a single
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run full, Tharanga mis-hits the drive to mid-on
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run short of a length, outside off, left alone
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run swings in, actually seams in after pitching, Tharanga is hit on the pad, but this is going down the leg side
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run back of a length, punched to cover
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run length ball, on the pads, pushed to mid-on
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run firm push from Tharanga, on the up, but can't beat mid-on. Maiden over
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run length ball, on off, Dilshan opens the body up, and drives it with an open face for single to sweeper-cover
Watson to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs length ball on the pads, not the ball to bowl to subcontinent batsmen with the fine leg in the circle. Tharanga places this wide of the man
Watson to Upul Tharanga, no run back of a length, closer to middle now, pushed back to Watson
Watson to Upul Tharanga, 1 run gets the width, steers this down to third man
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run opens the face on this fullish delivery, places it between point and cover-point
Watson to Upul Tharanga, 1 run short of a length, on the pads, Tharanga finds Johnson at short fine leg, but Johnson has trouble finding the ball, and concedes a single
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run bouncer outside off, Tharanga doesn't play at it
Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run gets a thick edge on this drive, and a single to third man
Lee to Dilshan, no run full, but swinging in, Dilshan is a touch late into the drive, finds mid-off

Lee to Dilshan, OUT Inswinger. Timber. Dilshan has been a touch late with the fuller deliveries, and this one is slightly shorter than the driving length, and sneaks in through the big gap between bat and pad. Middle stump is out, Lee is thrilled
Lee to Sangakkara, no run length ball, angling into the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Lee to Sangakkara, no run full and wide, Sanga tries to open the face on this one, is a touch early into the shot
Johnson to Upul Tharanga, 1 leg bye this one moves into the batsman, hits Tharanga on the pads. Johnson appeals, but clearly it is going down the leg side
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run looks to run this down square and steal a single, but has hit it straight to point
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run Sanga plays away from the body, on the up, towards point. He seems to trust this pitch, which has been flat
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run goes for the yorker, Sanga digs it out in front of leg
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run driven on the up again, but finds cover-point
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run closer to off, Sanga presses forward and plays this back to Johnson. Another maiden for Australia
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run loose drive well away from the body, with no foot movement at all. Is beaten by the away movement
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run fuller, closer to off, can't beat the cover ring
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run full, on the pads, can't beat square leg
Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run beats the cover ring this time, but there is a sweeper-cover in place
Lee to Sangakkara, 1 run length ball, angling in, pushed to mid-on, and take the single to Bollinger, who is not the quickest among the Aussies
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run this is full and swings away, which makes it quite handy delivery, especially since it is coming from round the stumps. Tharanga is beaten on the drive

Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run Johnson traps Sanga on the crease, hits his pad with the late movement in, but not before there is an inside edge. They sneak in the single, Ponting has a shy at the non-striker's end, but it is Sanga who hits the stumps with his dive

Johnson to Upul Tharanga, OUT Johnson strikes. His red-hot form continues. Digs this one in short, outside off, Tharanga looks to sway out of the line, but doesn't quite take the gloves out of the way. The ball doesn't quite rise up, and kisses the glove on the way

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs good delivery first up, pitches on a length, middle and off, seams away a touch, takes a thick edge, but Mahela's soft hands make sure it goes straight into the ground. And also wide of slip
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back of a length, Mahela rides the bounce and defends this to cover
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run slightly too straight, and Mahela takes a single to long leg
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run length ball outside off, driven on the up, to mid-off

Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 wide slightly dozey by Haddin, this is down the leg side, but not too wide, Haddin gets both his gloves to it, but it bounces out. Holds the hand up in apology immediately
Lee to Sangakkara, no run yorker outside off, Sanga digs it out
Lee to Sangakkara, no run pitches middle and off, moves away slightly, Sanga is behind the line in defence
Lee to Sangakkara, no run angled across, pushed to cover
Lee to Sangakkara, no run pitched on a length, angled across again, Sanga pushes forward to defend
Lee to Sangakkara, 2 runs a touch too straight, clipped off the pads, past square leg
Lee to Sangakkara, no run slight shape away from Sanga, who is behind the line, and defends
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run floater outside off, Mahela leaves it be
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs closer to the stumps, too close really, and Mahela clips it off the pads for a couple
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run presses right forward to defend this to cover
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back of a length, tucks Mahela up, who fends and keeps it down
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run steered to third man for a single
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run full, swinging in late, Sanga pushes it firmly to mid-on
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run the first ball drifts in nicely, but it is too full, and Mahela takes the easy single into the leg side
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run this is flatter, angled across, and is pushed to cover
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run flat again, Sanga moves across a touch, and plays this down to long-on for a single
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Doherty is much better to the right-hand batsman, this drifts in again, and Mahela defends this back
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run more drift in towards the right-hander, but yet to see any turn. Mahela defends this outside off
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run quicker and flatter, defended towards cover
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run length ball, Sanga is forward and pushes this to cover
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run slower ball, doesn't drop the pace by much, but Sanga punches this on the up, straight down the ground, gets a single by the time mid-on comes around
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run another good offcutter from Johnson. Pitches in the channel, makes him play, and then leaves him. Beaten
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run slightly wider, and Mahela guides this to third man for one
Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs full and wide, Sanga leans into the drive, gets a couple by the time sweeper-cover fields and throws
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run full and wide outside off, Sanga leaves this alone
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run angling into Mahela, who defends it back to Doherty
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run more drift for Doherty, but no turn, and Mahela plays it back to him
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run overpitched, gets an easy single to long-on
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run floater outside off, Sanga defends
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run shimmies down the ground, gets a single to long-on
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short and wide, cut away to deep point for a single
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run angling across Mahela, who pushes this to cover
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide short of a length, pitched outside leg, Mahela gets inside the line, but misses. Called a wide
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Mahela on his toes, and defends this to cover
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full outside off, driven to sweeper-cover
Bollinger to Sangakkara, 1 run full and wide to the left-hand batsman too, and he is driven to sweeper-cover again
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full and wide again, squeezes it out, past point
Bollinger to Sangakkara, no run short of a length, pitches close to off, seams in a touch, Sanga defends
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up, around middle and leg, defended to leg

Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Mahela tries the premeditated paddle, is beaten by the turn, there is an appeal for lbw, but the it is pitched just outside off, and has turned away ever so slightly
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run flighted generously again, Mahela comes forward and defends
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run slightly flat, guides this past point for a single
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run driven to cover
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run full on the pads, played late by Sanga, just around the corner for a single
Bollinger to Sangakkara, no run full outside off, Sanga drives it towards point
Bollinger to Sangakkara, no run
Bollinger to Sangakkara, 1 run length ball, wide of off, leans forward and drives it to sweeper-cover for one
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run dropped wide of midwicket, and they charge through for one
Bollinger to Sangakkara, no run short of a length, seams in, Sanga gets an inside edge onto the pad
Bollinger to Sangakkara, 1 run short of a length, angling in, guided towards long leg for one
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run drift for Doherty, wide outside off, driven towards sweeper-cover
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run good flight and dip on this one, pitches around off, and holds its line. Mahela defends
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run waits for this one and opens the face late for a single
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run tossed up outside off, worked away wide of midwicket for one

Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT Doherty gets his man, he has been frustrating Mahela with his accurate bowling and the drift that has been getting. Mahela goes for the big sweep from outside off, and places it right down deep square leg's throat
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 wide more drift here, but this is a wide down the leg side
Doherty to Chandimal, (no ball) oversteps... that's criminal for a spinner in limited-overs cricket... defended off the front foot
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal charges at Dhoerty to get off the mark off a free hit, hits this powerfully down the ground, but can't beat long-on
Bollinger to Chandimal, no run lovely bouncer, Chandimal has no clue about this, is hit on the helmet and nearly steps on the stumps. Top stuff, accurate bouncer. Chandimal manages a smile

Bollinger to Chandimal, OUT awesome bowling... the bouncer is followed up by the length ball, in the channel outside off. Chandimal is sitting inside the crease after that bouncer, and just leaves the bat to fry. The edge is taken. Good disciplined persistence from Australia o
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball, seaming away slightly, Mathews is slightly opened up, but keeps it down
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, no run bouncer now, Mathews sways out of the line
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, no run drives on the up, far away from his body, manages to keep it down
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball, pitches middle and leg, moves towards off, Mathews defends. Wicket-maiden for Bollinger
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run flighted outside off, pushed wide of point for one
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run some bite here, Doherty gets it to drift towards middle and left, and it then turns towards off. Defended
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run full on the pads, pushed towards midwicket
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run short and wide, cut away
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run Sanga dances down the track to get close to the pitch, and gets a single to long-on
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run flighted around middle and off, defended to cover
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 wide angled down the leg side for a wide
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run tossed up outside off, pushed past point for a single
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, 1 run full toss, hit straight, but misfielded by silly mid-off, which lets Mathews get his 1000th run
Hussey to Sangakkara, no run angled in, defended to silly mid-on
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run full toss outside off, driven down the ground for a single
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, 1 run angling across, Mathews plays with soft hands, and takes a single just wide of cover
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run this one turns away from Sanga, gets a thick edge for a single
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run short outside off, not short enough to cut, punched to cover-point
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run Smith has saved four here. Full and wide, nicely driven, but Smith puts in the dive at extra cover
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run floated outside off, pushed to point
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run slightly flatter, this time Sanga forces this through the cover ring for one
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run flighted outside off, Mathews drives it firmly to mid-off
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run another firm push, away from the body, towards cover
Hussey to Sangakkara, no run drifts in towards Sanga, who can't get it past the straight extra cover
Hussey to Sangakkara, no run tossed up outside off, pushed to extra cover
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run full toss outside off, driven down to long-on for one
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run Mathews presses forward and defends around his front pad
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run full, on the pads, can't get it past midwicket
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run floated wide outside off, pushed to short extra cover
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run length ball, around off, Sanga defends with soft hands
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run come down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and pushes this to long-on for one

Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run nice nice drift, this was well outside off when it left his hand, then moved in, pitched off, and straightened a touch. Pushed to the left of Doherty, who gets a hand to it, thus beating Smith with the deviation even though he was backing up we
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run short now, cut away to sweeper-cover for one
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run Mathews leaves his crease now, gets a single to long-off
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run Sanga uses his feet well to come down to the pitch of this delivery, pushes this to long-on
Hussey to Sangakkara, no run flighted around off, Sanga comes forward and defends
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run jumps out of the crease again, takes this nearly on the full, gets a single to long-off
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run tossed up outside off, defended
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run full on the pads, turns this to midwicket
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, 1 run driven down to long-on for another single
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run full, into the pads, pushed to long-on for one
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run flighted outside off, driven down to long-off for one
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run too far down the leg side, helped away for a single

Doherty to Sangakkara, SIX runs First boundary since the 11th over, and what a beautiful shot to bring that with... comes down the track, keeps himself slightly short of the itch, and then lets his arms go through this straight loft. The high elbow provides the cherry
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run full outside off, good to see he doesn't fire one in after getting hit for six. Defended
Doherty to Sangakkara, 2 runs flatter now, Sanga opens the face late, running it fine
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run strays on the pads, worked around the corner for one
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run shortish outside off, runs this to third man for one
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball, pitches middle and leg, moves away towards off, defended
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run angled across him, Mathews punches it to sweeper-cover for one
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run short and wide, cut away for one
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs full offcutter, gets a thick edge, which goes square of third man, gets them a couple
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run beautiful offcutter, pitches on a length, around off, Mathews plays at it, and is beaten by the movement

Doherty to Sangakkara, FOUR runs and what a peach... this drifts away from Sanga, and then turns and spits... gets a thin inside edge, and Haddin is nowhere close to the ball. He appeals for something, though. Only he knows what
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run quicker, into the pads, worked around the corner
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run pushed wide of cover for one

Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 wide harsh harsh call... this is drifting in the air, like a good old inswinger, lands on the guide line for wides. And the umpire spreads his arms. Give the bowlers some room, at least when they are beating the batsmen with drift!
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run into the pads now, turned to square leg for one
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run more drift for him, Mathews comes forward and defends
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run flatter delivery, pushed to cover
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run length ball, around off, Sanga pushes this to mid-off
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 leg bye full, on the pads, Johnson hits him on the pads, but stifles his appeal because he knows this is headed down the leg side
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run worked away off the pads for a single
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run goes for the full and straight delivery again, worked away for a single square on the on side
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run short ball, quick too, at 142ks, Mathews is tucked up, gets a single to third man
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run length ball, outside off, Sanga comes forward and defends solidly
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run the rare short and flat ball from Doherty, punched down to long-off for one
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run drifts outside off for Sanga, who pushes this with an open face for a single
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run lovely drift and dip, Mathews was looking to come down, but saw he was never going to get close to this, and defended
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run stays in his crease and defends this
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run short and wide, but this turns and bounce, and Mathews chooses to play it with soft hands
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run a quick delivery around off to end a good spell for Doherty. Mathews defends

Johnson to Sangakkara, no run superb yorker, swinging in late, in front of middle, but Johnson's appeal is stifled. Perhaps because he sees the ball hit the bat. I got a feeling it hit the boot first, though!
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run more swing into the pads, worked away for a single this time to bring up the fifty of this stand. Just one boundary in it
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs tucks him up with a short one, guided into the on side for a couple. The fine leg is very square
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run bowls a wide full toss, driven square, Ponting gets a hand to it at point, deflecting it towards sweeper-cover
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run short and wide, Sanga looks to run this down, gets a bottom edge well short of Haddin
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run bowled from behind the stumps, gets more swing into the left-hand batsman. Sanga pushes with soft hands, gets a single to mid-on
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run that's fifty for Sanga, through a gentle length ball on the pads, which he flicks away for a single
Watson to Angelo Mathews, no run back of a length, moves in a touch, punched to extra cover
Watson to Angelo Mathews, no run short of a length, just outside off, Mathews can't place this wide of Watson
Watson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run fuller, into the pads, nudged into the on side for one
Watson to Sangakkara, no run full ball, outside off, driven to extra cover. Smith puts in a desperate dive and saves runs, at least one
Watson to Sangakkara, no run angled in, back of a length, pushed to mid-on
Bollinger to Kulasekara, no run back of a length, middle and off, pushed to mid-on
Bollinger to Kulasekara, FOUR runs slower ball, angled across him, and he chips this over extra cover. A nice inside-out shot
Bollinger to Kulasekara, no run short, at his body, guided to point
Bollinger to Kulasekara, 1 run short and wide, cut away quite powerfully, can't beat deep point, though
Bollinger to Herath, no run pushes him onto the back foot with a shortish delivery, defended to cover
Bollinger to Herath, 1 run bouncer, into the chest area, Heratth gets some bat onto it, and keeps it down too. Takes the single towards square leg
Lee to Herath, 1 run another short one for Herath, who pulls this to fine leg for one
Lee to Kulasekara, no run wide yorker, beats Kula's attempt to squeeze it past point
Lee to Kulasekara, no run length ball, wide of off, but Kula hits it to straight extra cover
Lee to Kulasekara, 2 runs this yorker goes wrong, and he check-drives this low full toss straight of long-on for two
Lee to Kulasekara, no run slower ball, wide outside off, squirted square on the off side, but Ponting at point keeps them from taking the single
Lee to Kulasekara, no run short outside off, punched away stylishly, but straight to extra cover
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball on the pads, Mathews turns this to square leg, Sanga has to be sent back. Watson's throw is quick, but slightly wide
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run angled across, guided with an open face, but finds backward point
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, 1 run turns this around the corner for a single
Hussey to Sangakkara, no run flighted outside off, pushed to extra cover
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run that's tossed up higher, driven square on the off side for one
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run flat on the pads, worked away for one
Watson to Sangakkara, no run stops a touch at him, played towards midwicket
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run short of a length, pushed down to long-on
Watson to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs bouncer, pulled away nicely, keeps it down, gets a couple by the time Hussey runs around from deep square
Watson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run fuller now, pushed to long-on for an easy single
Watson to Sangakkara, no run tries the yorker, around middle and leg, Sanga keeps it out
Watson to Sangakkara, no run driven on the up, straight back, Watson dives and fields in his follow-through
Johnson to Herath, no run back of a length, just outside off, pushed to cover
Johnson to Herath, 2 runs short and wide, steered wide of third man, will come back for two
Johnson to Herath, 1 run worked into the on side for a single
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run tucked away off the hips for one
Johnson to Herath, OUT late swing for Johnson, accurate too, this pitches middle and off, and swings in, beats the bat, hits the pad for a pretty straightforward decision for Tony Hill
Johnson to Mendis, no run bowls full and wide, Mendis's outside edge is beaten
Watson to Kulasekara, no run slower ball, short outside off, looks to run this down fine, is beaten
Watson to Kulasekara, 1 run full, just outside off, Kula clears the front leg, and hits this down to long-on for one
Watson to Mendis, 1 run short of a length, punched away to sweeper-cover for one
Watson to Kulasekara, 1 run slower short ball, pulled away to deep square leg for one
Watson to Mendis, FOUR runs short and wide, and superbly cut away, suitably late to beat backward point. You won't be able rub that smile off his face
Watson to Mendis, no run yorker now, around off, Mendis keeps it out
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run length ball, around off, driven to long-off for one
Johnson to Mendis, no run short ball, holds its line, Mendis swings well inside the line. Beaten neck and crop
Johnson to Mendis, no run Mendis goes for the big hit down the ground, doesn't reach the line of the ball just outside off
Johnson to Mendis, 1 wide quick bouncer, but well down the leg side
Johnson to Mendis, no run straightens just a touch, gets the leading edge from Mendis, towards mid-off
Johnson to Mendis, 1 run Clarke drops a sitter at wide slip. Johnson had worked his man over, finally getting the outside edge with one that left him from round the stumps. But in and out!
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run now he bowls a wide full toss, which is slashed to third man for one
Watson to Kulasekara, 1 run looks for the yorker, but it is slightly short of one, Mendia hits it to long-on for one
Watson to Mendis, 1 run full toss outside off, driven square for a single

Watson to Kulasekara, OUT Clarke takes the catch now. Short of a length, Kula has an almighty heave at it, gets a leading edge, which stays forever in the sky, and Clarke completes a running catch from cover

Apart from the over-rate, 12 minutes too slow, Australia have little to complain about their effort in the field. Disciplined, well-planned, and executing their plans well, they keep Sri Lanka down to 207 on a flat track. Sanga and Kula played fluently, Dilshan and Mathews got starts
Back. Watson to face Malinga. One slip and a short extra cover in place
Malinga to Watson, 1 wide starts off with a wide down the leg side
Malinga to Watson, no run full and straight, Watson plays for the swing, it doesn't swing that much, and takes the inside edge onto the pad
Malinga to Watson, no run length ball, swinging away, pushed to cover. On the front foot to defend that
Malinga to Watson, no run full and straight, Watson punches on the front foot, Malinga fields it overhead, the crowd lets out a roar
Malinga to Watson, 2 wide wide down the leg side, Sanga has to put in a dive to prevent the boundary
Malinga to Haddin, 1 run nicely guided by Haddin, past point for a single
Malinga to Watson, no run full and straight, Watson plays straight too, towards mid-on
Malinga to Watson, no run slower ball yorker, it looked like it would be a full toss, but dipped mid-flight, and Watson has does really well to keep this out
Kulasekara to Haddin, no run big inswinger as usual, Haddin punches on the up, can't beat mid-on
Kulasekara to Haddin, no run back of a length, moves in from well outside off, punched on the up again, to mid-off
Kulasekara to Haddin, 2 runs stays deep in the crease, waits for this to swing, then closes the face late, gets two runs wide of deep backward square

Kulasekara to Haddin, FOUR runs loose shot... Haddin opens the front leg up, goes for a big booming cover drive, gets an inside edge, which goes past Herath at mid-on. Not a great fielding effort. Herath ran in angles, didn't dive either
Kulasekara to Haddin, no run back of a length, stands tall, and defends this to Kula

Kulasekara to Haddin, OUT Sanga has taken a special catch standing up! Haddin attempts another big drive on the ump, this one doesn't swing as much as he expects it to, takes the outside edge, and straight into Sanga's gloves. Not a big deflection, but still a superb catch when
Malinga to Watson, 1 run ow full toss on the pads, pushed wide of mid-on for one
Malinga to Ponting, no run length ball, on middle and leg, Ponting is half-forward, and defends
Malinga to Ponting, no run length ball outside off, Ponting is forward, defends this to short extra cover
Malinga to Ponting, no run slightly fuller, a slightly more certain forward lunge, pushes this to cover again
Malinga to Ponting, no run bouncer, Ponting is already forward, and then semi-ducks to avoid it

Malinga to Ponting, FOUR runs The Ponting push for four! Always good to see. Slightly more so now, for I have not seen this in a while. Lunges forward, the arms extend, the bat meets ball, no violence, but the ball follows orders, beating cover
Kulasekara to Watson, no run swinging in, back of a length, turned to midwicket
Kulasekara to Watson, no run slightly short of a length, Watson plays with an open face, towards point
Kulasekara to Watson, no run Watson is half-forward in defending this short-of-a-length delivery

Kulasekara to Watson, no run big inswinger, hits Watson who is well forward on the pad, a big shout ensues, but this was bouncing over, possibly hit him outside the line, and an inside edge can't be ruled out either
Kulasekara to Watson, no run cut away powerfully, can't beat point
Kulasekara to Watson, no run driven on the up, a good-looking shot, but can't beat extra cover

Malinga to Ponting, 2 runs length ball on the pads, Ponting plays the pick-up shot, not in the air for too long, Kulasekara has to make a big chase to his left, running from deep backward square. Puts one dive in, looks like he has deflected it towards the boundary, and then pu
Malinga to Ponting, no run slower one, Ponting comes forward, delays the defensive shot a touch
Malinga to Ponting, no run short outside off, but Ponting is already forward and cannot cut this, Guides this to point
Malinga to Ponting, no run slower one on the pads, clipped to midwicket, along the ground
Malinga to Ponting, no run another slower ball, Ponting guides it to point

Malinga to Ponting, FOUR runs another slower ball, Ponting steps forward, delays the shot a touch, and then caresses this through covers. It's a five-string ring, but he has found the gap. Malinga can't believe it
Kulasekara to Watson, no run angling in towards middle, gets a stride out and defends it past the bowler towards mid-on

Kulasekara to Watson, 2 runs goodish length on middle, mid-on has been pushed back, Watson crunches that firmly down the ground to steal a couple, long-on was a little wide and he made it back comfortably
Kulasekara to Watson, no run in the channel outside off, gets a stride out and defends it to point
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run bowls it full on the off, driven down towards long-on for a single
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run nipped back in, landed on a good length outside off and came back to beat Ponting through the gate, struck Sanga hard on the knee

Kulasekara to Ponting, FOUR runs the fielder in the deep has lost that completely, there was a fielder placed at deep square leg for that flick but he just didn't see it, straying on the pads and Ponting clips that elegantly past the square-leg umpire and the fielder positioned

Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run starts off with a slow (not slower, because this is his first ball) ball, Watson pushes to mid-off and takes a risky single. Makes up for it with a desperate dive in the end
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, no run short of a length, middle and leg, pushed to midwicket

Angelo Mathews to Ponting, no run Watson needs to calm down a touch with these singles. Again pushed straight to mid-on, and Watson is scampering back into the crease. Although here Ponting called him, and sent him back
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, no run slower ball, jumps at him a bit, Ponting takes the bottom hand off to keep it down
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, FOUR runs Ponting looks in superb touch. Another forward lunge, another push, square on the off side, beats cover-point. Silence in the stands
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, 1 run slower ball, too short, worked into the on side for a single
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run back of a length, swings in, Ponting is solid in defence
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run slightly shorter, slightly wider, Ponting looks to run this down. Is beaten
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run slightly short, slightly wide again, Ponting plays with an open face, finds cover-point

Kulasekara to Ponting, SIX runs well we saw the lunge-and-push for four, and even though Kuley is not sharp, he has pulled out the dismissive pull. This is cannon fodder actually. A long hop, gentle pace, and Ponting pulls it over midwicket
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run gets the big front foot in again and pushes this to cover
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run length ball, Ponting is well forward again, and pushes this to mid-off
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run slow, short, takes an age to come on, Watson pulls it to midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run slow and shortish, runs it fine, but can't beat short third man. Didn't have any pace to work with here
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run slow and short again, looks to turn this to leg, but is early into the shot
Angelo Mathews to Watson, FOUR runs Watson's first four, and what a shot. This is slightly quicker, and short, so Watson goes for the full-blooded cut, and the ball flies across the outfield
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run slow and short again, stays low too, Watson pulls nonetheless, on the bounce to deep midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, 1 run angling into the pads, worked away to deep midwicket for one
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run length ball, pushed back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run slower legcutter, cut away, but can't beat cover-point
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run Ponting is on the front foot to defend this short-of-a-length delivery
Kulasekara to Ponting, 3 runs slower ball again, but angling into the pads, and Ponting has used whatever pace there is it guide it past short fine leg
Kulasekara to Watson, no run back of a length, not much room, Watson punches it down the ground, to mid-off
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run driven on the up, wide of mid-off, gets a single
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run looks to run this down, but can't beat the short third man
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run Mathews is operating only in slower balls, this is the offcutter, stops at Watson, comes back uppishly, but well wide of Mathews
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run punched on the up, can't beat mid-off
Angelo Mathews to Watson, FOUR runs this is slow, short, asking to be hit. Watson obliges with the pull
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run slow again, pushed to midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 2 runs slow, short, wide, cut wide of deep cover for two
Herath to Ponting, 1 run Ponting takes this from middle, bunts it into the on side for one

Herath to Watson, 1 run Watson seemed to have made up his mind he was going to clear the front leg and go for a big one. This is the in-between length, so can neither pull nor slog-sweep. Gets the single to long-on
Herath to Ponting, no run defended around the front pad
Herath to Ponting, no run this is tossed up outside off, Ponting lunges forward and defends
Herath to Ponting, no run another forward-defensive from Ponting
Herath to Ponting, 1 run full on the pads, helped away for one
Mendis to Ponting, no run starts off with a carrom ball, Ponting comes forward and pushes it back
Mendis to Ponting, no run another carrom ball, just outside off, leaving him, pushed to cover
Mendis to Ponting, no run legbreak again, too full, driven to cover
Mendis to Ponting, no run starts straighter, tries the googly, but this doesn't turn, Ponting defends around the front pad
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run gentle full toss, Ponting pulls it to deep square for one
Mendis to Watson, 1 run overpitched, Watson drives down the ground, gets a single to long-on
Herath to Watson, 1 run just a mere push down the ground, but it is a firm shot, and gets him a single
Herath to Ponting, 3 runs Ponting is looking as good as I have seen him in recent times, this is only slightly short, and he is back early and cuts this in front of square
Herath to Watson, FOUR runs too fast, too straight, and Watson glances this fine for four
Herath to Watson, FOUR runs now Watson manufactures the cutting length. This is slightly short, but flat, and Watson plays the late-cut, beats backward point, and the outfield is blazing quick

Herath to Watson, SIX runs whoa. What a pull. Decimating Herath here. Again only slightly short, but Watson picks the length early, and pulls this over midwicket. Hits the ice box just outside the rope
Herath to Watson, no run a comprehensive forward-defensive to end the over
Mendis to Ponting, no run carrom ball, pitches middle and off, breaks away, gets a thick edge towards cover
Mendis to Ponting, no run Ponting well forward to defend this
Mendis to Ponting, no run the googly now, just outside off, doesn't turn much, defended
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run this legbreak is too short, Ponting punches this on the up, gets a single to long-off
Mendis to Watson, no run length ball, pushed back to the bowler
Mendis to Watson, 1 run slightly short, Watson rocks back early, gets a single just wide of extra cover
Herath to Watson, no run flighted delivery, goes with the arm, hits Watson on the pad, but is clearly headed down the leg side
Herath to Watson, 1 run the carrom ball, comes in towards Watson's pad, who punches it down t long-off for one
Herath to Ponting, no run another carrom ball, Ponting is well forward and outside the line of off
Herath to Ponting, no run another forward-defensive from Watson
Herath to Ponting, 1 run pushed wide of mid-on for one
Herath to Watson, 1 run Watson is having his way with the bowlers now, makes room and smashes this perfectly decent delivery. Extra cover puts in a dive to keep them to one
Mendis to Watson, no run googly, middle and leg, Watson defends
Mendis to Watson, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven down to long-off for one
Mendis to Ponting, 2 runs full on the pads, worked away for a single
Mendis to Ponting, no run carrom ball, middle and off, defended back
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run full toss on the pads, gets a single to deep midwicket
Mendis to Watson, 1 run short and asking to be pulled. Watson obliges, gets a single
Malinga to Watson, 1 run swings in late - not sure if it was reverse - Watson gets a leg-bye
Malinga to Ponting, no run definite late swing for Malinga, Ponting drives, gets a bit of an inside edge towards square leg
Malinga to Ponting, no run slightly shorter, Ponting is well forward and defends
Malinga to Ponting, 2 wide wide down the leg side, swings late, Sanga dives and saves the boundary
Malinga to Watson, 1 run almost squeezes through, Watson is driving but it swings late and takes the inside edge towards fine leg. Watson reaches 1000 runs for the year. Trott at 933 is placed next
Malinga to Ponting, 2 runs full on the pads, clipped away for a couple, wide of deep square
Malinga to Ponting, 1 run slower ball, into the pads, worked past short midwicket
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run carrom ball, pushed towards sweeper-cover for one
Mendis to Watson, 1 run cut away to deep point for a single
Mendis to Ponting, no run carrom ball, not much turn, defended to cover
Mendis to Ponting, no run well forward to defend it to mid-on
Mendis to Ponting, no run cut away, but can't beat point
Mendis to Ponting, no run stays in the crease to defend this
Malinga to Watson, 1 run full, straight, tailing in late, pushed down the ground, mid-on is deep

Malinga to Ponting, FOUR runs the first uncertain shot from Ponting tonight. Not a slower ball, but stops a touch, Ponting is lunging forward, but is early into the shot, and ends up chipping it right of short midwicket
Malinga to Ponting, 1 run that is more like Ponting, this is full and on the pads, and he plays the pick-up shot for one
Malinga to Watson, no run full toss on the pads, Watson misses out because of the late swing

Malinga to Watson, OUT the bat-pad gap is created this time! Clatter behind Watson. Noise in the stands again. This is full and straight, starts around off, tails in late, Watson looks for a drive down the ground, but is beaten by the swing. Middle and leg stumps are disturbed
Malinga to Clarke, no run late inswing again, Clarke's bat comes down threateningly late. Keeps it out
Herath to Ponting, no run full, just outside off, pushed to extra cover
Herath to Ponting, 1 run that's fifty for Ponting. Good to see him back in form. Turns this off the pad. No reception from the crowd
Herath to Clarke, 2 runs nicely played by Clarke, who is forward almost instinctively and whips this wide of mid-on
Herath to Clarke, no run slightly short, plays this late and off the back foot, finds point, though
Herath to Clarke, 1 run too full, too straight, placed wide of mid-on for one

Herath to Ponting, no run hit uppishly towards extra cover, it falls short of a diving Dilshan. It probably stopped a touch at Ponting. Oh replays show it did in fact carry, Dilshan got a hand to it, but couldn't hold on. Mind you, he had to dive low to his right
Malinga to Clarke, no run
Malinga to Clarke, 3 wide big wide down the leg side, Sanga just gets a touch
Malinga to Clarke, no run full toss, Clarke plays it watchfully
Malinga to Clarke, no run full, swinging in, defended towards midwicket
Malinga to Clarke, no run another reversing yorker, keeps it out
Malinga to Clarke, no run brave leave - the reversing ball, starts outside off, not too wide, but Clarke lets it go. As it turns out, rightly, because it misses comfortably
Malinga to Clarke, (no ball) another brave leave... this is a length ball, not too far outside off, but Clarke lets it go. Turns out, this isn't so brave. Malinga has overstepped
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run full toss down the leg side, cramps Clarke who is backing away to make room. Hit to deep square for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run full, on the pads, worked away for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run another bunt into the leg side for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run cut away from in front of the stumps, finds point
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run big front foot down to smother the turn
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run leaves his crease to play the forward-defensive
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track again, takes this on the full, and drives it to long-off for one
Herath to Clarke, no run goes deep in the crease and cuts a delivery not too short. Finds point
Herath to Clarke, no run presses forward, then goes back to defend
Herath to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track, chips this over Herath's head for a single. Oh wait, this is a leading edge, but safe anyway
Herath to Ponting, 1 wide tossed up outside leg, no turn
Herath to Ponting, 2 runs too straight again, worked around the corner, with soft hands. The deep fielder has to come in to field this, and Ponting steals the second
Herath to Ponting, 1 run carrom ball, no alarms for Ponting who drives it down to wide long-on for one
Herath to Clarke, 1 run slightly short, Clarke is quick to rock back and cut this in front of square for one
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run driven powerfully to short extra, Dilshan is deceptively quick with the one-handed pick-up-and-throw. However, he misses the stumps, and concedes the overthrow
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run plays the chip, inside-out, on the bounce to wide long-off
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run forward-defensive
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track, places this into the on side for another single
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run short and wide, cut away for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run short again, hit down to long-off for one
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run helped with the angle towards square leg
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run the rare loose shot, Clarke throws his arms at this wide delivery, it nips in and beats the inside edge
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run back of a length, Clarke is on the front foot, and guides this wide of mid-on for one
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run comes forward to a length ball, pushes this back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Ponting, FOUR runs SHOT! Half-volley, just outside off, driven between the bowler and mid-off
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run full, on the pads, played to one of the two short midwickets
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run carrom ball, too short, pushed to long-off for one
Mendis to Ponting, no run punched square of the wicket, can't beat point
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run overpitched, placed wide of mid-on for one
Mendis to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke picks the googly early, dances down the track, and lofts it over mid-on. Doing it easily now
Mendis to Clarke, no run carrom ball, pitches middle, leaves him, pushed back
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run full, on the pads, bunted into the on side for one
Herath to Clarke, 1 run short outside off, makes room to cut it past point
Herath to Ponting, 1 run floats it outside off, gets forward and guides it behind point
Herath to Clarke, no run shortish outside off, punched wide of cover
Herath to Clarke, SIX runs imperious, Clarke is stepping up, tossed up and he sensed a chance, charged down the track, got to the pitch and smashed it high and handsome over long-on
Herath to Clarke, 1 run shortish outside off, rocks back and cracks it hard to deep cover for a single
Herath to Ponting, 1 run punched off the back foot to that deep cover fielder for one more
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run shortish on the off, rocks back to punch it down the ground to long-off for a single
Dilshan to Clarke, no run slightly short on the off, gets back and plays it back to the bowler
Dilshan to Clarke, no run floats it outside off, rocks forward and defends it into the off side

Dilshan to Clarke, 2 runs comes down the track and turns it wide of a diving midwicket who gets a hand to it and palms it off in the direction of long-on, the batsmen are alert enough to run back for the second
Dilshan to Clarke, 2 runs long hop, pulled away to the right of deep midwicket for a couple more to raise the 50-stand
Dilshan to Clarke, no run comes down the track and tickles it down to square leg, Australia are coasting here
Mendis to Ponting, no run legbreak, around middle and off, defended to midwicket
Mendis to Ponting, 2 runs too straight, placed perfectly between fine leg and deep square, comes back for two
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run the offbreak - and not the googly - but too short, and Ponting pulls this to deep midwicket
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run full, straight, driven down to long-on for one
Mendis to Ponting, no run googly, Ponting cuts in front of square, but finds cover
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run another googly, but Mendis has hardly extracted any turn. Ponting works this into the on side for one
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run tossed up outside off, dropped wide of cover for one
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run another wide tossed-up delivery, driven down to long-off for one

Dilshan to Ponting, no run Review. This is an appeal for an lbw, although it has hit Ponting on the glove. That's the kind of review when the captain thinks why not use one when there are two in store. This is an offbreak that pitched middle and off, turned big, hit the glove,
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 leg bye well bowled, Dilshan gets some drift away from Ponting, making him strecth, then the offbreak beats his bat, but they steal the leg-bye
Dilshan to Clarke, no run full, flatter, pushed to midwicket
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run short, Clarke wants to pull, but this stays low, so he ends up punching this to deep midwicket
Malinga to Clarke, no run full, slight swing in, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
Malinga to Clarke, no run full, straight, tailing in, defended
Malinga to Clarke, 1 leg bye short ball, surprises Clarke, who lets it hit hie forearm
Malinga to Ponting, FOUR runs full, swings in deliciously late, Ponting tries the cover-drive, gets an inside edge for four. Rehearses the straight drive immediately after
Malinga to Ponting, no run and he now plays the straight drive, which is much more convincing although it doesn't beat mid-on
Malinga to Ponting, 1 run low full toss on the pads, flicked square for a single
Dilshan to Ponting, no run shortish offbreak, pushed to midwicket
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run more drift for Dilshan, Ponting nudges this behind square on the off side, Gets a single to move to his best ODI score in Sri Lanka

Dilshan to Clarke, SIX runs Captain is denying former captain a century. Jokes apart, though, this is a superb shot. Comes down the track, is close enough to the pitch of the ball, and goes inside-out over wide long-off
Dilshan to Clarke, no run beautifully bowled, but dropped by Sanga. This is lightly flat, holds its line, takes a healthy edge, goes into the glove and out
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track to drive this to long-off for one
Dilshan to Ponting, no run flighted delivery, pushed to midwicket
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run full, late inswinger, clipped away uppishly, but wide of square leg
Malinga to Ponting, no run late-swinging yorker, Ponting keeps this out
Malinga to Ponting, no run length ball, driven on the up, finds mid-on
Malinga to Ponting, FOUR runs the yorker goes wrong, slightly too full, slightly too straight, and Ponting deflects it to fine leg for four
Malinga to Ponting, no run gets this yorker right, Ponting digs it out in front of off
Malinga to Ponting, 1 wide short, Ponting gets under it, called wide. Slightly down the leg side, I think
Malinga to Ponting, 1 run full, just outside off, digs this out for a single
Herath to Ponting, 1 run slightly short, Ponting punches this to sweeper-cover for a single
Herath to Clarke, no run good turn and bounce this time, from middle and leg, Clarke pushes this to cover
Herath to Clarke, 1 run full, on the pads, bunted into the on side for a single
Herath to Ponting, 1 run plays the forward-defensive with an open face, gets a single wide of point
Herath to Clarke, 1 run angling into the pads, turning away, played against the turn to take a single around the corner
Herath to Ponting, no run tossed up around middle and leg, pushed to extra cover
Kulasekara to Clarke, FOUR runs Shot! Clarke dances down the track, and crashes this inside-out, between mid-off and extra cover, all along the ground
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run yorker outside off, digs it out
Kulasekara to Clarke, FOUR runs short ball, Clarke feasts on it even though he has committed to the front foot. He pulls this from outside off, over midwicket
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run full, outside off, squeezed square, J Mendis makes a diving save at point
Kulasekara to Ponting, 1 run full toss outside off, driven square for a single
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run digs this yorker out
Herath to Ponting, 1 run cut in front of square for one
Herath to Clarke, no run full, on the pads, pushed to midwicket
Herath to Clarke, no run another defensive shot towards midwicket
Herath to Clarke, 1 run even at this stage, Malinga makes a diving save at backward-point to deny Australia three runs
Herath to Ponting, 2 runs fine paddle-sweep from Ponting, comes back for two
Herath to Ponting, no run tossed up, driven back to the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run short to start off, punched to extra cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run chips down the track, pushes this to midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run tossed up around middle and leg, defended
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run Clarke comes down the track, takes this on the full, and gets a single to long-off
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run flighted generously, Ponting drives, but can't beat the straight extra cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 3 runs full and down the leg side, Ponting tries the paddle, seems to have made contact because it is not called wides
Herath to Ponting, 1 run pushed wide of midwicket for one
Herath to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke cuts this in front of square for four, removes his helmet, hugs Ponting, and the duo then starts shaking the Sri Lankans' hands

Fifth ODI win in a row for Australia, and how convincing this has been. Set up by the bowlers on a flat wicket. They were disciplined, bowled to a plan, and never let the pressure off. And it was must fun to watch Ponting back in form. Playing with certainty and freedom. I would stil
Presentation time
That's all we have for you tonight. Thanks for keeping us company on a Sunday. Do join us for the rest of the series. Okay bye
Australia won by 8 wickets (with 70 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Ricky Ponting, AUS
